website_summaries.verdict: This reliable, smooth-edged knife slices your meat rather than shredding it.
pros: Crafted from one piece of stainless steel
Handcrafted wooden handle is riveted in place
Comes with fork for securing the meat while carving
cons: The knife could be sharper when it arrives, but it sharpens easily

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: These knives were everything I'd hoped for and more! Plenty sharp enough to effortlessly cut through our Thanksgiving turkey and ham without feeling dangerous which is a big concern for me since I'm a klutz. That may sound silly to people who have a sure grip but for me, it's a matter of "do I have to go to the ER this year or not?" if knives are not easy for me to use. ;) I bought an electric knife set as well but I didn't even take it out of the box because this set worked perfectly! I'm keeping my knife and fork set stored in the box they came in so they stay nice for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carving set - nice quality and value for the money. I wasn't too crazy about the box, I prefer a wood presentation/storage box so I ended up spending a few dollars for a wood painters brush box with the slide out top to put this set in. I just removed the molded insert from the box these came in and put it in the wood brush box and snapped the knife and fork into place and it is now a really nice presentation for a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: ElCzort

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. I gave up on my old carving knife at Thanksgiving. This is a great set. I looked at some others at the $100 price point and decided to take a chance on what I assumed was a smaller company. The knife, working in concert with the extended fork allowed me to prepare thin slices consistently. For the price I have a difficult time believing you can find a better carving set.
customer_reviews.author: FJSIII

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Set
customer_reviews.text: The lousy job we did (once again) on our Thanksgiving turkey convinced me that we really needed an nice cutlery set, and I decided to gift my husband with one for Christmas. I never expected to find such a nice set at that price, but the good reviews convinced me to try it; I'm so glad I did! It did our Christmas ham proud (even the thin slices I prefer) and made my husband fel like a carving expert. It also came packaged beautifully in a handy storage box. Thank you, "A Cut Above" for such a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: AuntiNette

customer_reviews.title: Turkey carving made easy!
customer_reviews.text: Cut our 14lb bird as easy as slicing bread. Very happy with the purchase and it arrived on time for Thanksgiving feast. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this combo set for anyone wanting to make their carving effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: William A

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set of knives
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the outer packaging and seeing the box containing the knives I automatically knew I would be pleased. The presentation is only exceeded by the quality of the carving knife and fork. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a chef
customer_reviews.text: Great knife. Bought this to carve my Turkey and it worked out perfectly. It was nice and sharp. Made well and comes in a nice box
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I wasn’t expecting much especially for the price, but they look expensive and the knife cut very well. I love the storage box they came in, too!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a good carving set for serving prime rib on NYE! Since then, we have used the set two or three times for family dinners. Packaged nicely for storage between uses!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. It is a sturdy, attractive set that cuts beautifully and is easy to sharpen.
customer_reviews.author: BMac

customer_reviews.title: Nice Knife & Fork Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice knife & fork set for the money. The knife stays sharp and has decent balance. I really do like the fork for carving as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jon G Warren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price, unbeatable quality. Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal quality or the price - worth every penny! Great packaging for gift giving. Used it to carve this year’s turkey, and the knife did all the work—ridiculously sharp, very well made.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: This carving knife and fork set were just perfect for the Thanksgiving turkey. Sliced great. Nice looking set too.
customer_reviews.author: C C K

customer_reviews.title: A Cut Above Cutlery Lives Up To Its Name!
customer_reviews.text: This set was an early Christmas gift to be used at Thanksgiving. It worked perfectly on carving the turkey, and the job was done much more quickly and expertly. In addition, this is a really nice-looking set!
customer_reviews.author: L & H Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great carving set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time this Thanksgiving; worked great! Longer fork than most
customer_reviews.author: David Darby

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I used this carving knife and fork set to slice my first Easter ham. Now understand I am no surgeon when it comes to slicing and dicing but this knife made life easy for me. It was sharp, well balanced, and went through the meat like butter! You can go wrong with is set.
customer_reviews.author: Fred L.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this carving set for my parents for Christmas. Packaging was great and they feel beautiful in the hand. They appear to be of high quality so I assume they will last a long time. Seller sent excellent tips on care and storage to prolong the edge of the knife via email. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Burns

customer_reviews.title: Value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price. It's my second purchase from this company and I'm highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ivelys Santos Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Arrived sharp and ready to cut!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to have a knife for carving our Thanksgiving turkey. So glad I chose A Cut Above Cutlery! Carved the turkey perfectly! It was nice and sharp and easy to hold for making the cuts on the bird. I would definitely recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: John Prince

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, but....
customer_reviews.text: Carved our turkey for first trial with this set. I thought the knife could have been sharper. Well balanced it is, but it would not rank as the sharpest knife in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Seidenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It came perfect timing to cut into my prime rib! Very sharp and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last minute after remembering I needed for thanksgiving. Wasn’t sure it would be good quality because the price was so inexpensive. But it was awesome. It did need to be sharpened, but I have one of those cheap knife sharpeners that worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make for nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this set as a gift and they absolutely love it! Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cutlery set. It is great quality without spending a lot of money. I will be so proud at Thanksgiving to hand these to my nephew to carve the turkey!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my father in law...and he loves it!!! It showed up alot sooner than expected also!!
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful presentation.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice presentation and boxing. Knife and "fork" feel good in hand and initial use work very well.
customer_reviews.author: M Engel

customer_reviews.title: A True Cut Above
customer_reviews.text: The knife set arrived in a timely manner, and the high quality knife box was an added bonus. The knife seems to be made of high quality metal that will hold out well over many years of use. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The knife set made the process of carving turkey at Thanksgiving dinner easier.
customer_reviews.author: azmom

customer_reviews.title: great for turkey day
customer_reviews.text: used these to carve my turkey. no complaints. awesome buy
customer_reviews.author: R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Made carving the turkey a lot easier this time around. Item was packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: Aajay Durgaprasad

customer_reviews.title: but I like the feel and the look
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this as a gift, but I like the feel and the look, I will print out and pass along the instructions you sent. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lurene

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and carved the thanksgiving turkey beautifully. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Gammon

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality knife and fork set
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality knife and fork set. Very pleased and so were my friends who were given the set as a X-mas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Tkach

customer_reviews.title: This set is AWESOME. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This set is AWESOME. Worth every penny, and more! A work of art and the price is a give-a-away :-) Thanks A Cut Above Cutlery!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First time using and the knife was incredibly sharp, I carved a brisket with ease
customer_reviews.author: sjwalt38

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful knife set
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful knife set, now i just have to wait for thanksgiving to get some use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: amethyst2015

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not magically imbue me with the skill of carving a turkey. :(
customer_reviews.author: Umopepisdn

customer_reviews.title: A real bargain
customer_reviews.text: The set was delivered as promised,I purchased it as a gift for a young couple who I know did not have a carving set.I was actually the first user (at their house) & was very happy with the set. I would have liked to see the fork a little heavier than it was but for home use it should be more than adequate.The set is sleek,attractive & looks & feels to be well built. I am a retired professional foodservice worker,
customer_reviews.author: Rock Creek Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: My S.O. is a barbecue nut. I saw reviews from other barbecue fans and decided to check out this set. Very sharp straight from the box. The knife feels balanced and a good weight in my hand. (My other knives are German forged.) S.O. is happy with the set and looks forward to carving his smoked turkey on Thanksgiving. We highly recommend this carving set. Very good quality at an amazing price. It's also great to support a small start up company!
customer_reviews.author: a cook

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value/great gift
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our son & daughter-in-law who hosted Christmas this year. Right out of the lovely gift box, my son used the knife to carve the turkey. The knife was sharp & did an excellent job. The fork is very good looking & stylish. I can’t vouch for the durability because the set has only been used one time so far. It does look like it will wear well. The description says that it stays sharp so I will trust that.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie K.

customer_reviews.title: Holiday carving like a boss!
customer_reviews.text: Took these out of the nice storage box where they nest and placed them on the cutting board next to the Thanksgiving turkey. The turkey carver picked up the knife and said, "Wow! This is a Pro Chef grade knife!" He sliced that smoked turkey up like nothing. Beautiful, thin slices. Sturdy and balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Carving Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent carving set! We used it at Thanksgiving & it carved up a turkey super fast! It has a very sharp edge & the box that it came in is very nice. This' definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: JACTX

customer_reviews.title: The best knife I own!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife for the purpose of carving a turkey. I was very pleased with the outcome. The knife was small enough to fit my hand perfectly, and sharp enough to get the turkey carved. I will use it for lots of things, I’m sure. And if I need more knives in the future I definitely will considered A Cut Above!
customer_reviews.author: Musicman02

customer_reviews.title: It is important to use a good knife.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this knife to carve the turkey on Thanksgiving. I did not use it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Laurent Taran

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Worked very nicely this Thanksgiving. Arrived an atractive box, would be a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: NotedToday

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVED this set and said it made his job (the ONLY one) of carving the bird for Thanksgiving and Christmas much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Stace23

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought the set for my son to carve the Christmas rib roast. He felt it was sharp enough right out of the box. It will get a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C

customer_reviews.title: Plus the box is good for storage/travel when I take my smoker on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was hoping for; a matched set with high quality that keeps an edge. Plus the box is good for storage/travel when I take my smoker on the road. A must for BBQ and Smoking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great! Great Product!  Beautifully made!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this carving set for Thanksgiving! It worked beautifully! The quality workmanship of the set was Wow!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Z

customer_reviews.title: I bought this knife with high hopes for thanksgiving carving ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife with high hopes for thanksgiving carving but instead of slicing the turkey it kinda just shredded it. It was dulled when it arrived and when I sharpened it it still just shredded the turkey. We had to use a knife we previously had because it was sharper than the new knife.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: My husband specifically got this knife for cutting large pieces of meat. He really likes it. Sharp and durable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Goff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and did a great job
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and did a great job. The set is a bargain if your looking for a carving set to add to your cutlery inventory.
customer_reviews.author: George W Starks

customer_reviews.title: the set comes in a very sturdy case. The knife and for set are of ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality and value for the price. the set comes in a very sturdy case. The knife and for set are of excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mik Keith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set - comes in a very nice box with ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set - comes in a very nice box with protective covers on the tips of the forks and knife. Highly recommend! Can't wait to use it at Christmas dinner.
customer_reviews.author: DesignMama

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set! Carved nicely our turkey dinner. Beautiful box. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: RnRFowler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great knife set good quality sharp would make a nice addition to anyone knife set

customer_reviews.title: cut easily through the thanksgiving turkey
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp out of the box, cut easily through the thanksgiving turkey.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Gafter

customer_reviews.title: Terrific carving set
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great price. I've needed a nice carving knife set for a long time and I'm very pleased. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Cappiello

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality product matching its name. Other products I have acquired did not live up to its billing.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard P Kilcoyne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This knife set is absolutely a cut above the rest! I was very impressed by the quality of this set: it more than met my expectations! I am definitely going to be purchasing more knives from this company. I also need to mention the customer service from this company is above and beyond. The last thing I expected was an email asking me if the knife set arrived OK and if I was happy with the knife set. You can't go wrong with this company. Awesome knife set, awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.author: April834

customer_reviews.title: Blade is scratched and very dull
customer_reviews.text: Item came scratched with a very dull blade. Not worth $27.00
customer_reviews.author: Henry A

customer_reviews.title: Have not used since purchase but they look great. Very well constructed and they will be appreciated ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not used since purchase but they look great. Very well constructed and they will be appreciated during the holidays. I am happy with purchase at this time but the proof will be in the pudding as they say. Shipped in a timely manner and the follow up was greatly appreciated. Guess I need to cook something to carve.
customer_reviews.author: Kona Guy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: OK NOT THE BEST, BUT GOOD SECOND PAIR OF KNIVES
customer_reviews.author: SAMMY D

product_meta.title: A Cut Above Cutlery Carving Knife Set, Extended Fork Holds the Largest Turkey, Roast or Ham Securely, 8 Inch Stainless Steel Blade Slices Cleanly, Won't Shred- Carve Your Dinner Like A Pro Chef
product_meta.description:
Just in time for Thanksgiving and the Holiday Season, A Cut Above Cutlery's 8 Inch Stainless Steel Carving Knife Set is in stock now! Looking for the perfect gift this season?
Ready to carve your Holiday Turkey, Roast or Ham in style this year?
Tired of inferior knives that shred instead of slice? We have you covered with the style and top quality you've come to expect from A Cut Above Cutlery. Key Features that Make All the Difference:
-Our Knife has a high quality, extremely sharp 3Cr13 Stainless Steel 8 Inch straight-edge blade that slices, never shreds.
-At a full 8 Inches, the tines on our Extended Fork hold even the largest Turkeys, Roasts and Ham in place, keeping you safe and making the carving process much easier!
-Beautiful Carved Pakka Wood handles are well balanced and feel great in your hand.
-Attractive storage box keeps your knives safe in the off-season, and makes a great gift box too. A little about us:
A Cut Above Cutlery is a family owned and operated company. We love cooking and we genuinely want everyone who buys our products to be completely satisfied with everything we sell, every time. We'll go the extra mile to make that happen. We love hearing from you and if you contact us, you'll hear back from our founder directly. Buy your Carving Knife Set now, knowing that it's a completely risk-free decision thanks to our LIFETIME, SUPER SIMPLE GUARANTEE AND WARRANTY. If you don't like our Carving Knife and Fork Set at ANY time for ANY reason, WE WILL GIVE YOU YOUR MONEY BACK. PERIOD.
feature_bullets: A BLADE THAT STAYS SHARP LONGER AND AN EXTENDED FORK THAT HOLDS EVEN THE LARGEST BIRD STEADY OR YOUR MONEY BACK - Our Carving Knife and Fork set are each forged from a single piece of stainless steel, with hand-carved wooden handles triple-riveted in place. They're well balanced and will keep you secure while carving even the largest Turkey, Ham, Roast, Rack of Ribs, Goose or Prime Rib you can find.

SLICES, NEVER SHREDS- YOUR PRESENTATION WILL NEVER LOOK BETTER, GUARANTEED - Our Carving Knife has a classic, straight edge favored by top chefs the world over. Other carving sets use micro-serrated edges that tend to catch in the meat and shred it. Electric carving knives use a sawing motion as opposed to a smooth, natural, slicing one. All this adds up to an easier time for you, and a better looking meal for your guests.

TIMELESS AND CLASSIC DESIGN MAKES AN ELEGANT GIFT - The beautiful, sleek design of our Carving Knife and Fork Set makes it an excellent and beautiful gift, year round. It makes a truly thoughtful gift for Weddings, Anniversaries, Birthdays, Christmas, Thanksgiving, Easter, Father's Day, Mother's Day, or even just as a simple thank you for the chef in your life. Our presentation-quality storage and gift box adds just the right finishing touch.

SAVE MONEY AND TIME, SHARPEN YOUR KNIVES LESS OFTEN - All A Cut Above Cutlery knives, including our Carving Knife, hold an edge well over time, meaning you'll make fewer trips to the professional knife sharpener. Over the course of a year, most people sharpen their knives 3 or 4 times- and at up to $5 per knife for professional sharpening, that adds up pretty quickly.

LIFETIME, SUPER SIMPLE GUARANTEE AND WARRANTY - If you don't like our Carving Set at any time for any reason, will will give you your money back immediately. We stand behind all of our products without reservation, and we use them in our kitchens every day. Heck, if we don't like them, why should you? But if you don't, we've got you covered. Period.
